name: Chains (itch) (Rendow)
description:
Chains

Chains was depeloped using Unity under 48 hours  during the game jam Ludum Dare 46 solo compo (Theme: Keep it alive).  The game is a turn based RPG where the goal of the game is to defeat the boss on the map. Use WASD/arrow keys to move and RETURN to interact and select options.  Takes around 10 minutes to complete. 

Feel free to leave any comments you might have, I appreciate the feedback!
